column2: my favorite sandwich is the gulf shrimp and blue crab. They definitely didn't skimp on the filling as without the toothpick
column3: the delicious and crunchy shrimp and crab would've fallen everywhere. Plus the dressing that comes with it really heightens the salty flavor. In term of sides
column4: I prefer the quinoa and the kale. Also
column5: I've had the chicken soup before
column8: and it'd be way more worth to get two sides. Finally
column9: I really like their mintade. It has a strong citrusy flavor that goes along with all the other refreshing food.
